channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Roblox now requires age verification to use in-game chat
item.description: Roblox Corporation, the company behind the popular online game platform Roblox, announced today that age verification will now be required for any users wishing to use in-game chat in all regions where the feature is available. This comes after mounting pressure to protect underage players and lawsuits from multiple state attorneys general like Louisiana and Texas. Starting January 7, players in the US and abroad will need to submit to facial age estimation via a selfie. Users 13 years of age or older may opt for ID-based checks. These features were given a trial rollout late last year in Aust...

item.title: Xiaomi Mix Flip à -64 % : l’occasion d’avoir un smartphone pliant vraiment pas cher pendant les soldes
item.description: Avant de découvrir la deuxième version de ce Mix Flip, Cdiscount fait une remise de plus de 60 % sur ce smartphone pliant : il passe alors de 1 299 euros au lancement à seulement 468 euros aujourd'hui.

item.title: Here are 13 TV deals I'd buy in the new year — clearance prices starting at just $69.99
item.description: Best Buy is running a clearance sale on its best-selling TVs, and I'm rounding up 13 deals I'd buy from Samsung, TCL, and LG, with prices starting at just $69.99.

item.title: Fulham vs Chelsea Live Streams: How to Watch Premier League 2025-26 From Anywhere in the World
item.description: We'll show you how to watch Fulham vs Chelsea live streams from anywhere as Calum McFarlane takes charge of his final game before handing over to Liam Rosenior.

item.title: UK Government pledges £210m to new cyber action plan, admitting 'critically high' cyber risk remains
item.description: Britain's Tech Minister wants to totally change how the UK Government handles cybersecurity, criticizing current silos.

item.title: Le patron de Nvidia voit dans les « immigrés IA » une réponse à la pénurie de main d’œuvre
item.description: Les robots qui prendront la place des humains dans les usines ne sont pas un problème pour le patron de Nvidia. Jensen Huang estime en effet que ces robots — des « immigrants IA », selon son qualificatif — occuperont les emplois dont nous ne voulons pas.

item.title: iPolish brings color-changing press-on smart nails to CES
item.description: In the original, and best Total Recall, you may remember a scene in which Rekall’s receptionist changes her nail polish by using a digital pen. Now, after only 35 years, a company came to CES 2026 with a vision for such a gadget that actually works outside of that pricey sci-fi movie. The company is iPolish, and it makes press-on acrylic nails that, when you apply an electric charge, change color almost like magic.In order to enjoy kaleidoscopic nails, you’ll need to charge the wand, which then connects to your phone. Once you’ve selected your color of choice, you just put the tip of the nail ...

item.title: New Records Reveal the Mess RFK Jr. Left When He Dumped a Dead Bear in Central Park
item.description: Robert F. Kennedy Jr. says he left a bear cub's corpse in Central Park in 2014 to "be fun." Records newly obtained by WIRED show what he left New York civil servants to clean up.

item.title: Presets L, M ou K ? Voici comment bien configurer le DLSS 4.5 selon votre carte graphique Nvidia
item.description: Le DLSS 4.5 promet une qualité d'image supérieure pour tous les possesseurs de cartes graphiques RTX, mais tous les joueurs ne seront pas logés à la même enseigne. On fait le point sur les différents réglages conseillés pour cette nouvelle version.

item.title: Authorities Investigating Gruesome Death of Whale Found on a Ship in New Jersey
item.description: The recovered carcass is believed to be a fin whale, the second largest species on Earth.

item.title: The Ancient Art of Nasal Rinsing Might Protect You From a Cold
item.description: New research has given credence to a 5,000-year-old practice.

item.title: Google s’attaquerait à un aspect essentiel de votre santé avec ces nouvelles fonctions de récupération
item.description: Google plancherait sur de nouvelles fonctions de dette et de besoin de sommeil au sein de son application Fitbit. De quoi mieux vous conseiller sur votre récupération si vous portez une montre Fitbit ou une Pixel Watch.

item.title: WhatsApp upgrades group chats with member tags and text stickers
item.description: WhatsApp just rolled out some upgrades to group chats. Perhaps the most interesting is the addition of member tags, which lets users give themselves a tag that's customized for a specific group. Meta gives examples of a user assigning themself the role of a dad in one chat and a soccer goalkeeper in another. This could actually be pretty useful to people who use WhatsApp group chats to role play as characters, organize fantasy sports leagues and other stuff like that. The platform is also rolling out text stickers to group chats. This lets users turn just about any word into a sticker via an i...

item.title: Meilleurs smartphones Honor en 2026 : quel modèle est fait pour vous ?
item.description: La marque chinoise Honor prend une place toujours plus importante sur le marché de la téléphonie en 2026. Parmi toute la gamme, quel smartphone Honor choisir ? Suivez le guide !

item.title: The biggest TV announcements at CES 2026
item.description:
CES is once again where TV manufacturers lay out their plans for the year ahead, and CES 2026 is shaping up to be a showcase of both familiar rivalries and genuinely new display tech. While OLED and Mini LED remain central to most lineups, Micro RGB has emerged as one of the most talked-about developments at the show so far, especially at the higher end of the market. Below are the TV announcements that stood out most from the pre-show events and early press conferences, with more expected as CES continues. Samsung Micro RGB TVs Samsung's flagship Micro RGB TV
Engadget
Samsung’s Micro RG...

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S26 specs predictions: rumored specs for every model
item.description: We've collected all the credible spec rumors for the Samsung Galaxy S26 series, to create complete specs lists for the three upcoming phones.

item.title: Soldes d’hiver 2026 : la 4K est à petit prix dans cette sélection des meilleures offres sur les TV et les vidéoprojecteurs
item.description: Les soldes d'hiver font moins de bruit que le Black Friday, mais cela reste une occasion de dénicher de belles affaires. Sur les TV 4K et les vidéoprojecteurs par exemple, pour remplacer son écran poussiéreux par une dalle OLED flambant neuve ou un vidéoprojecteur dernier cri.

item.title: Proton VPN : le service premium devient ultra-accessible avec cette offre flash lors des soldes d’hiver 2026 [Sponso]
item.description: Il est temps de protéger tous vos appareils numériques et de prendre soin de vos données personnelles. Le service premium Proton VPN profite durant les soldes d’hiver 2026 d’une belle remise de 70 % ramenant son prix à tout juste 2,99 euros par mois.

item.title: Climate Models Don’t Account for This Surprising Shift in the North Pacific Storm Track
item.description: Climate change is unexpectedly causing north Pacific storms to shift toward the Arctic, throwing projections for future West Coast weather into question.

item.title: Windows 11 transforme enfin l’affichage de vos applications Android sur PC
item.description: Microsoft fait évoluer la diffusion des applications Android de votre smartphone sur l'écran d'un PC sous Windows 11. Le changement est aussi simple qu'efficace.

item.title: 773,000-Year-Old Fossils Add a New Twist to Humanity’s Deep Origins
item.description: New research sheds light on the ancestors that gave rise to Neanderthals, Denisovans—and us.

item.title: Jack Black’s Biggest Regret in Life Is Turning Down Playing Syndrome in ‘The Incredibles’
item.description: Turns out Black got a bit too big for his britches requesting a rewrite, which ultimately got his Pixar offer revoked.

item.title: I just saw L'Oréal's ultra-flexible silicone LED mask, and it's about to seriously shake up the beauty market
item.description: Exclusive: "We wanted to create something inspired by a sheet mask, which could be thin, pliable, flexible, but could work as well as the masks that are at the highest level, technically."

item.title: Venezuela Is the First Big Test for the Pentagon's Influencer Press Corps—and It's Failing
item.description: Mainstream reporters are out at the Pentagon, and right-wing influencers are in. The results are predictable, and oddly reminiscent of Iraq War-era warblogging.

item.title: How Quilt solved the heat pump’s biggest challenge
item.description: Quilt's heat pumps are built containing a suite of sensors, which have delivered mountains of data that allow its engineers to wring added performance out of its systems.

item.title: Eyebot promises an accurate eye test in a couple of minutes
item.description: Eye tests are an important part of life, but they aren’t always the most convenient things to work into your schedule. It’s an issue Eyebot thinks it has solved with its kiosk, which shrinks the time taken from 20 minutes to closer to three minutes. Plus, you don’t need to book an appointment where an optician will lean too close in to your face while trial and error-ing corrective lenses. As mundane as a subject as a visit to the eye doctor is, this device could have some fairly massive ramifications. And, having tested it, I can certainly see the benefits.Eyebot CEO Matthias Hofmann said tha...

item.title: Virgin River season 7 set to arrive on Netflix in March 2026 — here’s what that tells us about the storyline
item.description: Virgin River season 7 release date will answer at least one major season 6 cliffhanger, and it’s never been more obvious which.

item.title: Everything announced at CES 2026
item.description: It's the first week of a new year and there's no time for the tech world to slowly ease back into things following the holidays. That's because CES 2026 is in full swing, with all manner of companies descending on Las Vegas to reveal their latest innovations and what they're planning to bring your way in the near future. Many of the Engadget crew are on the ground to check out as much of the new tech as possible. Of course, we're keeping tabs on all of the major CES press conferences too. Samsung held its First Look presentation, which focuses on home products, while LG has shown off a wide ar...

item.title: Utah Becomes First State to Let AI Prescribe Medication
item.description: The startup offering the renewals is eyeing nationwide approval.

item.description: J'ai pu essayer un casque audio unique en son genre puisqu'il se transforme en enceinte Bluetooth par un simple geste. Voici le TDM Neo.

item.description: L'iPhone 16 saura vous émerveiller avec sa dalle OLED de 6,1 pouces, mais aussi son interface toujours aussi fluide. Chez E.Leclerc, il s'offre une belle remise de 30 % et tombe à 899 euros.

item.title: Breville Luxe Brewer Review (2025): Good Drip, Real Cold Brew
item.description: Like a lot of Breville's best devices, the Luxe Brewer combines technical sophistication with easy single-button operation.

item.title: Sick of Microslop? New Linux distro could win over Windows 11 haters
item.description: Does the future belong to Linux? It's way too early to call that, but the new Loss32 project should make Microsoft sit up and take notice.

item.description: CES always delivers some weird and wonderful camera tech – here's my pick from the 2026 show.

item.title: I swapped running for the Japanese walking workout — complete with a purpose-built high-performance walking shoe
item.description: Do we really need a performance walking shoe? I decided to find out by trying the biggest walking fitness craze out there.

item.description: Nikon has suggested it's focusing on producing new APS-C mirrorless cameras – here are the likely 2026 contenders.

item.title: Les utilisateurs Mac de souris Logitech pris au piège d’une « erreur inexcusable »
item.description: Oups. Logitech a laissé en plan de nombreux utilisateurs de ses souris qui, sur Mac, n'ont pas pu se servir de leurs périphériques comme ils l'entendent. La cause : l'expiration d'un certificat de sécurité qui a empêché macOS d'exécuter les logiciels du constructeur pendant quelques heures. L'incident a depuis été réparé, mais les utilisateurs doivent tout de même mettre la main à la pâte pour réparer les pots cassés....

item.title: WhatsApp rolls out new group chat features, including member tags
item.description: You can choose a tag that gives others in the group chat more context about who you are.

item.description: The X Tower is an “urban guardian” that uses AI to detect public threats.

item.title: Fallout season 2 episode 4 sparks a big new fan theory about what's really going on in Vaults 31, 32, and 33
item.description: Fallout season 2 contains a missable Easter egg in its fourth chapter – and fans think they know how it'll affect the show's story.

item.title: Switchbot came to CES with a laundry robot you might actually be able to buy
item.description: CES 2026 isn't the first year we've seen a wave of interesting robots or even useful robots crop up in Las Vegas. But it's the first year I can remember when there have been so many humanoid and humanoid-like robots performing actually useful tasks. Of those, Switchbot's Onero H1 has been one of the most intriguing robot helpers I've seen on the show floor, especially because the company says that it will actually go on sale later this year (though it won't come cheap). Up to now, Chinese company Switchbot has been known for its robot vacuums and smart home devices. Much of that expertise is e...

item.title: Nvidia and Siemens reveal fusion energy partnership at CES 2026
item.description: Other highlights of day 2 at CES included a vacuum by Roborock that cleans as it climbs stairs. Crowds flooded the freshly opened showroom floors on Day 2 of the CES and were met by thousands of robots, AI companions, assistants, health longevity tech, wearables and more.Siemens President and CEO Roland Busch kicked off the day with a keynote detailing how its customers are harnessing artificial intelligence to transform their businesses. He was joined onstage by Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang to announce an expanded partnership, saying they are launching a new AI-driven industrial revolution to rein...

item.title: You can turn this modular clamp-on controller into an N64 or GameCube gamepad
item.description: Hyperkin announced a new clamp-on style wireless controller created in collaboration with GameSir. The X5 Alteron features similar functionality to GameSir's GameSir G8 Plus that debuted in 2024 with an expanding telescopic mechanism that can clamp onto smartphones, tablets, and several versions of the Nintendo Switch, replacing the Joy-Cons. What sets the X5 Alteron apart […]...

item.title: Spotify now lets you share what you’re streaming in real time with friends
item.description: You can tap a friend’s listening activity to play the track, save it, open the menu, or react with an emoji.

item.title: Lego Smart Play hands-on: Using Smart Brick technology to get kids to play together
item.description: Lego’s Smart Play system announced at CES 2026 earlier this week is a new embrace of digital technology that we haven’t seen from the company before. While the demo Lego gave at its press conference on Monday was a good start to showing what Smart Bricks are capable of, it really isn’t a substitute for seeing it in person. I was able to get an extended demo that answered many of my questions about how the system will work once Lego fans of all ages get their hands on the first Smart Play sets.As I detailed yesterday, the Smart Play system contains three elements. The Smart Brick is packed with...

item.description: Josh and his team set out to uncover long-standing mysteries. Here’s how you can watch Expedition X season 11 online and from anywhere.

item.description: OnePlus hasn’t released a ‘Pro’ version of its flagship handset for years – but new rumors have got me excited to see how the brand could improve on its recent five-star flagship.

item.title: Nvidia DLSS 4.5 : la mise à jour qui fait mal aux propriétaires de RTX 3000 et 2000
item.description: Nvidia promettait des images plus propres avec le DLSS 4.5, et sur ce point, la nouvelle version tient parole. Mais si vous jouez avec une RTX 2000 ou 3000, la facture côté performances risque de piquer un peu plus que prévu.

item.title: You can still save $100 on those excellent Fortnite PS5 bundles right now — but the deals might not be around for much longer
item.description: The PS5 Cobalt Star Bundle is the perfect place to begin a PS5 or Fortnite journey, and you can currently save $100 on bundles with both at PlayStation Direct.

item.title: All the laptops that caught our eye at CES 2026
item.description: CES remains a key stage for laptop makers to lay out their plans for the year ahead. At CES 2026, that meant new flagship productivity machines, reconsidered gaming notebooks and solid incremental updates across several major lineups. While we’re still seeing embargoes lift and hands-on time on the show floor, the announcements below reflect the most significant laptops we’ve seen so far. Plus, the list will grow as more companies reveal details throughout January 6 and beyond.Lenovo Legion Pro RollableLenovo Legion Pro RollableEngadgetLenovo came prepared for CES 2026 with a ton of laptops — ...

item.title: Le nouvel aspirateur robot de Roborock monte les escaliers avec ses deux pattes
item.description: Les robots domestiques font peut-être fureur au CES, mais sans attendre ni dépenser des sommes folles, les consommateurs qui le souhaitent peuvent déjà en avoir un avant-goût : après tout, les aspirateurs robots sont en quelque sorte les précurseurs de ces futurs majordomes à tout faire ! Et Roborock s'emploie à brouiller les frontières avec son nouveau concept, le Saros Rover....

item.title: Spotify is finally bringing your friends’ Listening Activity to mobile
item.description: Since almost day one, Spotify has offered the ability to creep on your friends' listening habits - but you could mostly only uncover those guilty pleasures on the desktop app. The company experimented with a community feature on the mobile app back in 2022, but it never officially launched. Now the company is finally bringing […]

item.title: Throne, from the co-founder of Whoop, uses computer vision to study your poop
item.description: Throne has rocked up to CES 2026 to show off its forthcoming toilet computer which uses computer vision to study your poop. It hangs from the side of the bowl and has a camera and microphone to track bowel motions and urination and offer feedback. It was co-founded by (activity tracker) Whoop co-founder John Capodilupo, who explained the hardware is designed to understand what your base state is to be able to identify when you fall out of that pattern. Capodilupo explained the hardware will look at how often you go, the texture and size of your motions, as well as the volume. The eventual aim...

item.title: Le télescope James-Webb est tombé sur des « galaxies ornithorynques » dans l’Univers primitif qui déroutent les astronomes
item.description: « On se dit que ces choses ne devraient pas exister ensemble, mais elles sont là, juste devant vous, et c’est indéniable. » C’est ce que des biologistes pourraient bien dire à propos de l’ornithorynque. C’est surtout ce que des astronomes rapportent aujourd’hui d’une poignée d’objets...

item.title: Boston Dynamics unveils production-ready version of Atlas robot at CES 2026
item.description: Boston Dynamics' Atlas is finally entering production. After years of testing this humanoid robot (and forcing it to dance), the robotics company announced at CES 2026 that the final version of the machine is being built now. The first companies to receive deployments will be Hyundai, Boston Dynamics' majority shareholder, and Google DeepMind, the firm’s new AI partner.This final enterprise version of Atlas "can perform a wide array of industrial tasks," according to Boston Dynamics, and is specifically designed with consistency and reliability in mind. Atlas can work autonomously, via a teleo...

item.title: Précision cardio, triathlon et capteurs externes : pourquoi cette mise à jour Suunto est une excellente nouvelle pour les sportifs
item.description: La marque finlandaise Suunto vient de déployer une mise à jour massive pour ses montres de sport. Au programme, une meilleure gestion des capteurs externes, une plus grande précision du suivi cardio ou de nouveaux modes multisport.

item.title: Warner Bros. Discovery rejects Paramount’s bid again, calls it a ‘leveraged buyout’
item.description: The studio's board unanimously rejected Paramount Skydance's revised $108.4 billion bid, calling the proposal a "leveraged buyout" that would saddle the company with $87 billion in debt.

item.title: Apple's latest 25W MagSafe charger drops to only $30
item.description:
One way you can reduce the number of cables you have to deal with on the regular is by investing in a few wireless chargers. Those with iPhones should consider Apple's own MagSafe charger not only because of its sleek and effective design, but also because it's on sale right now at Amazon. The Qi2.2-rated MagSafe charger is down to $30 for the one-meter version, or $40 for the two-meter version.
If you have an iPhone 16, iPhone 17 or iPhone Air, this cable can charge your device at 25W as long as it's connected to a 30W power adapter on the other end. While you'll need a more recent iPhone ...

item.title: 'It's a good idea': Jensen Huang hints that Nvidia could consider bringing back older graphics cards to solve GPU pricing crisis
item.description: Fed up with high gaming GPU prices caused by AI demand? Nvidia's solution could be AI, ironically – or even to bring back older GPUs.

item.title: CES 2026 Day 1: The biggest tech news and gadgets you missed from the first official day of the show
item.description: CES 2026’s first official show day kept the pace up with a mix of near-term gaming upgrades, ambitious new form factors and a few reminders that not every gadget needs to do everything. NVIDIA announced important gaming news, we caught up with Samsung’s tri-fold phone and Lenovo marched out an army of impressive looking gaming laptops and concept tech. Here are the biggest stories from January 6.NVIDIANVIDIA's G-Sync Pulsar is the next evolution of its VRR technology.NVIDIANVIDIA’s gaming updates focused on making motion look cleaner and boosting performance without forcing developers to rebui...
